title: my.getUpdateManager
content:
# my.getUpdateManager

2022-07-03 18:44

Call this API to create an UpdateManager object. The UpdateManager is a globally unique manager of the version update, which is used to manage the mini program updates.

## Return value

The return value is [UpdateManager](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_update_updatemanager_overview).
